testsuite.name: 42 - I can use approval column in worksheets

testcase.name: 42 - I can use approval column in worksheets LM-42-11 Should fail to complete once changes are made after approval

testcase.name: 42 - I can use approval column in worksheets LM-42-15 Should fail approved sample
